text: aur dharatee mein aapas mein mile hue kaee khand hain aur udyaan (baag) hain angooron ke tatha khetee aur khajoor ke vrksh hain. kuchh ekhare aur kuchh dohare, sab ek hee jal se seenche jaate hain aur ham kuchh ko svaad mein kuchh se adhik kar dete hain, vaastav mein, isamen bahut see nishaaniyaan hain, un logon ke lie, jo soojh-boojh rakhate hain
